select * from ( select DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY u.use_at desc, u.member_id, c.name) as rn, u.use_at, sum(u.mileage) as mileage, c.name, LISTAGG(m.title, ', ') within group(order by m.title) as title from usage_history u, common_code c, music m where u.place = c.id and u.pks = m.id and u.member_id = #{memberId} and u.place = 'U01'
and u.use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
and u.use_at BETWEEN TO_DATE('1900-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2999-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
group by u.use_at, u.member_id, c.name order by u.use_at desc ) where rn> (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} and rn <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
